address: Unit G5, Harbour Yard, Chelsea Harbour
description: Flexion Mobile Plc engages in the development of mobile application software. The firm offers a range of services, such as enabling, testing, updates, billing, channel mgmt, distribution, compliance customer service, and settlement/ reporting. The Company’s solutions enable game developers to make games independent of distribution platforms; launch and monetize in high-growth emerging countries; distribute to an open market of OEMs, carriers, and application stores; minimize impact on production costs through automated enabling; and distribute a single game version everywhere. Its solutions enable distribution channels to access to the games catalogue.
name: Flexion Mobile PLC
